description: This filter is used to hold transactions for review if the amount is less than or greater than a value configured for the account.
This filter is used to decline transactions if the number of transactions for the account exceeds a value configured for the account.
This filter is used to hold transactions for review if the IP address of the transaction does not match the IP address of the account.
This filter is used to decline transactions if the country of the transaction does not match the country of the account.
